body_html:
If anyone is interested, I built a cuda 10 magma conda package.

You can find it here: https://anaconda.org/cpbotha/magma-cuda10

More details here: https://vxlabs.com/2018/11/04/pytorch-1-0-preview-nov-4-2018-packages-with-full-cuda-10-support-for-your-ubuntu-18-04-x86_64-systems/

body:
If anyone is interested, I built a cuda 10 magma conda package.

You can find it here: https://anaconda.org/cpbotha/magma-cuda10

More details here: https://vxlabs.com/2018/11/04/pytorch-1-0-preview-nov-4-2018-packages-with-full-cuda-10-support-for-your-ubuntu-18-04-x86_64-systems/
